content.html:
When I try to compile this branch with libgazebo3d-1.9-dev for stereo support, I get to 73% and hit this error message:

/home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::gui::JointMaker::CreateHotSpot(gazebo::gui::JointData*)’:
/home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:596:15: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
   parentHandle->setColour(color);
               ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:31:0,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:24:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgrePrerequisites.h:151:11: error: forward declaration of ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
     class Billboard;
           ^
/home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::gui::JointMaker::Update()’:
/home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:682:44: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
             joint->handles->getBillboard(0)->setColour(color);
                                            ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:31:0,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:24:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgrePrerequisites.h:151:11: error: forward declaration of ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
     class Billboard;
           ^
/home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:686:42: error: invalid use of incomplete type ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
           joint->handles->getBillboard(0)->setPosition(
                                          ^
In file included from /usr/include/OGRE/Ogre.h:31:0,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/ogre_gazebo.h:26,
                 from /home/jackie/gazebo/gazebo/gui/model/JointMaker.cc:24:
/usr/include/OGRE/OgrePrerequisites.h:151:11: error: forward declaration of ‘class Ogre::Billboard’
     class Billboard;

perhaps our version of Ogre 1.9 doesn't support billboards, which were added in JointMaker after haptix diverged from default.
